EVALUATION D'UN PROJET REGIONAL DE
            CHEMIN DE FER - COTE D'IVOIRE/HAUTE-VOLTA

abstracts.cdata!:
The project would cover priority items
            of the 1978-79 portion of RAN's 1977-1982 investment
            plan. It would primarily consist of track realignment and
            renewal of track material in the Ivory Coast; track
            improvement in Upper Volta; procurement of locomotives;
            freight cars and track maintenance equipment, provision of
            training facilities and consulting services for technical
            training and management improvement and to carry out
            feasibility studies.
